data.title: Sangarius - Horse trained by Sir Michael Stoute
data.meta_description: Sangarius won impressively last year at Royal Ascot but wasn’t seen out after this for rest of season.  Was this due to injury and if that is the case
data.text:
by Chris Newing

(London)

Si Michael Stoute

Sangarius won impressively last year at Royal Ascot but wasn’t seen out after this for rest of season.

Was this due to injury and if that is the case has he now fully recovered?

What is his first intended target in 2020?

Answer: Sangarius was not injured last year and likely did not run again due to there being no suitable race for him.

He is entered on Friday, 05 June 2020 - 3:00

(Four day) at Newmarket Paradise Stakes (Listed Race) (1m)
